comments.author: rpierzina@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
The burnham application was developed for a new end-to-end tests project that aims to to automatically verify that Glean-based products correctly measure, collect, and submit non-personal information to the GCP-based Data Platform and that the received telemetry data is then correctly processed, stored to the respective tables and made available in Big Query. 

The source code for burnham is hosted on GitHub at https://github.com/mozilla/burnham. 

Please enable the application ID `burnham`.
